product_lines.description: List of different product lines offered by Zoominfo.

product_line_name.description: A category of products solving specific business needs.

description.description: Optional descriptive text of the product line.

product_skus.description: List of product SKUs, representing specific versions/tiers of a product line.

product_sku_name.description: A distinct product SKU or plan name.

description.description: Optional descriptive text of the product SKU.

features.description: List of different features, representing functionalities or tools within a product.

description.description: Optional descriptive text of the feature.

security.description: List of different security/compliance standards, detailing standards or compliance certifications.

security_name.description: Name/identifier for the security detail or certification.

description.description: Optional descriptive text of the security measure.

smes.description: List of subject matter experts (SMEs) affiliated with these products/features.

sme_name.description: Name or identifier of the SME.

role.description: Role or expertise area of the SME.

use_cases.description: List of different use cases describing how a product solves a specific business need.

use_case_name.description: Name or title of the use case.

description.description: Optional descriptive text of how/why this use case applies.

relationships.description: List of relationships among entities (e.g., which product_skus belong to which product_line).

source_type.description: Type of the originating entity in this relationship.

source_name.description: Name (or unique identifier) of the source entity.

target_type.description: Type of the destination entity in this relationship.

target_name.description: Name (or unique identifier) of the target entity.
